description.ko: 공간과 무(無)의 경계가 사라지고, 어둠의 에너지가 고요하게 일렁이는 VOID-3 섹터의 가장 깊은 곳으로 향하는 몰입형 여정입니다.
description.en: An immersive journey into the furthest reaches of the VOID-3 sector, where the boundary between space and nothingness dissolves into a silent, shimmering expanse of dark energy.

prompt: Cinematic wide shot of the VOID-3 dimension, a vast cosmic abyss filled with swirling dark matter and bioluminescent nebulae in deep indigo and obsidian black. Intricate geometric structures floating in the vacuum, reflecting faint starlight. Hyper-realistic, 8k resolution, minimalist sci-fi aesthetic, ethereal atmosphere, volumetric lighting.
